lyrics.text:
’E hoku kaunga mamahi,
‘I he’etau fai fononga,
‘I he toafa ni,
Ke mou fakangalo’i si’i
‘A homou ngaahi mamahi,
Mo e manavahē.

Pea mou vakai ki tu’a,
‘I he toafa, tangi ni,
Ki he fu’u mo’unga,
Pea mou sio ki mu’a,
Ki kō atu ‘i taimi ni,
Mo e fu’u ‘atā ni.

Ki he maama ko hēvani,
Ko e nofo’anga lelei
‘O e angatonu,
Ke mou fei, mo puna hake,
‘I he kapakau mālohi,
‘O e fa’a tui.

Kapau ‘oku tau mamahi,
Mo hotau ‘Eiki, ‘i lalo,
Pea fa’a kataki,
Te tau hoko atu ki he,
Potu ‘o hono fofonga,
Ke tau nonofo ai.

Ko e mata’i koloa,
‘E ma’u ia ‘e he tui,
‘Oku fa’a kātaki,
Ko e kau fua kolosi,
Ko e mo’oni te nau ma’u,
‘A e fu’u kalauni.

Monū’ia tu’o tolu,
Ko e ‘amanaki lelei,
Fakahikihiki,
‘Oku fakaakeake
‘A e laumālie vaivai,
Pea mo’ui ai.
